functions.name: Get Users with specific forum badge
functions.description: Returns all users for a specific badge

args.name: Data to submit
args.description: The object containing the domain of the website using discourse, its apiKey and the identifier of the badge we want the users to be filtered for

functions.name: Get user registered in forum
functions.description: Returns all users registered in your forum

args.name: Data to submit
args.description: The object containing the domain of the website using discourse, its apiKey and the identifier of the badge we want the users to be filtered for
